sentences:
Theology is the eighth full - length album by Irish singer Sinéad O'Connor .
It was released in 2007 on Rubyworks ( and Koch Records in the US ) .
The album consists of two discs , the acoustic " Dublin Sessions " and the full - band " London Sessions " .
The first single from Theology is " I Do n't Know How to Love Him " ( an Andrew Lloyd Webber and Tim Rice song from Jesus Christ Superstar ) .
In the issue dated 14 July 2007 , the album entered the US Billboard 200 chart at number 168 .
The album also debuted in the top 20 of Billboard 's Independent Albums list at number 15 .
First - week sales of the album in the US amounted to 4,700 units , while the record also charted in Ireland , France and Italy .
The album sold 375,000 copies worldwide .
